comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.telaflixhd.site/2023/11/ruim-pra-cachorro.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.telaflixhd.site%2F2023%2F11%2Fruim-pra-cachorro.html) ### Comment > * Click on the large image to open the player page/fake blog > * Click on `Eu não sou um robô` (I'm not a bot) > * AdGuard gets detected if it's on > * If AdGuard is off, the player appears at the bottom of the page ### Screenshots

issue.title: fetlife.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://fetlife.com/users/6338653/posts/10201869](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffetlife.com%2Fusers%2F6338653%2Fposts%2F10201869) ### Comment > Historically AdGuard blocks these, which is the main reason I pay for it. Now it blocks it for a little while (maybe 30 minutes of site use) and then I have to re-teach AdGuard to block it. It takes 3-5 repetitions then it will block them for awhile again, but they start showing up again. Username: `@anonymous` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tmsk388av9wog4o4wcs0so8ckswscwodmvit1aye2g.png?nc=1)
